scenario_name: Unauthorized Access to Customer Investment Portfolio Data
description: A junior analyst, posing as a senior manager, attempts to access sensitive customer investment portfolio data via an internal API.  The analyst uses social engineering to obtain temporary elevated privileges, exceeding their authorized access.
initial_goal: Analyze aggregated investment performance metrics for Q3 2024.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking - specifically, a wealth management division focusing on high-net-worth individuals.
